item.title: trying to use castanet theme
item.description: 22:20 Thursday 19 July 2018 JST I am trying to use castanet but cannot get it to show blog entries. I guess I should more carefully read the docs for castanet. 07:02 Friday 20 July 2018 JST One problem was having tags listed not in quotes. I had to change this tags: [ “mt3” ] to this tags: [ "mt3" ]
